Each person is different (background, experiences, personality, training) and we must recognize that God can and will deal differently with different people. He uses one â€˜lawâ€™ with me, another â€˜lawâ€™ with you, and so on. A law is a set of rules or demands, so when I judge a brother I am questioning the way (â€˜lawâ€™) that God is working on him.
